title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: We dont need the goverment give us their currency.After we get to know new currency by the time their rich friends such us gerry gacnlers and all those kind of people will have this new currency all ready alot in their wallets.So lets pick up the future currency wich is cheap and high supply that can be enough ammount for many people.It can be usdt...but its centralised and controlled we dont need this as new currency.We are sick and tired of those elite talking and making decisions there is no way to become super rich if we follow those people also crypto restrictions are joke those who make those laws should not even bother other people lifes with their bs they just preventing us to become super wealthy thats it and now they want to give us their crap central bank digital currency, no tnx we can create our own eco system and own money system we have a lot crypto options wich one we can choose from becouse by the time they give us they will have this new cyrrency for themselfes all ready by today...so its pretty much like we start monopoly but they all ready got advantages b4 the game will start We want something like monero...any ideas ?
